reviews.text:
With its very peculiar decoration at its entrance this place captured my attention. As it was literally next door to the hotel I chose for my staying in Vilnius it was an easy choice when it came to choose where to go for a late lunch.

I was delighted to see the care for the decor continued inside.

Their menu is very extensive and can accommodate a bit every taste.

I was keen to try the pancakes with potatoes and I'm glad I did. Lovely texture, nice heartwarming savory snack.

Everything was nice and I'm sure it would have been lovely to see the place with more customers if only I had gone in a different time of the day.

I found I had to wait a surprisingly long time for my pancackes. It may have been necessary for the recipe but I was not ready for that.

Great place with a really cool atmosphere. Alice in Wonderland atmosphere with pancakes. The best thing is the organization. QR code with a menu with good descriptions and photos that allows you to pay for your order right away and after a few moments the waiter brings the order to the table (even though the staff warned that it was busy and you had to wait a long time, the order was ready in less than 30 minutes). Great thing! The food was delicious and you can see how it is prepared, 10/10!
Good selection of pancakes. We had crepes with ham+cheese, ham+cheese+mushrooms and banana+chocolate. All very tasty. Good size. Reasonably priced. Recommended.
Great place with a fun menu. Friendly waitresses. But if you don't want to interact with the staff, you can order and pay via the q-code on the table.

The selection of crepes was very detailed. Including sweet and savory and easily customizable. All of our food was good and the staff were friendly and helpful although there was a misunderstanding about one of the orders. But they tried to make it right. I would go here again. I noticed lots of youngsters here but think adults would like it too. You can watch them make the crepes which always entertains me. I would go here again and recommend it to others.
